self_contained_context.background: The installer must validate the execution environment before any installation action. Virtual environment detection is a hard requirement that cannot be bypassed.
prerequisites: 01-01: Error Codes Module must be complete
self_contained_context.technical_context: Create preflight_checker.py with check_virtual_environment() function. Check sys.prefix != sys.base_prefix for virtual environment detection. Return PreflightResult with success/failure and error code. Use ENV_NO_VENV error code from error_codes.py.

task_specification.name: Virtual Environment Check
task_specification.description: Create preflight_checker.py with virtual environment detection. Hard block when not in virtual environment. No bypass flag allowed.
task_specification.motivation: Installing nWave outside a virtual environment could pollute the system Python and cause dependency conflicts. This is a non-negotiable safety requirement.
task_specification.detailed_instructions: 1. Create scripts/install/preflight_checker.py with PreflightResult dataclass. 2. Implement check_virtual_environment() checking sys.prefix != sys.base_prefix. 3. Return appropriate error with ENV_NO_VENV code when not in venv. 4. Implement run_preflight_checks() orchestrating all checks. 5. Create tests/unit/test_preflight_checker.py with venv detection tests.
task_specification.acceptance_criteria: Environment validation runs before any installation action; Pre-flight check validates virtual environment first; Pre-flight results are logged; Installation blocked when not in virtual environment; Skip-checks flag does not bypass virtual environment requirement; Installation proceeds when in virtual environment

acceptance_test.scenario_name: Environment validation runs before any installation action

mapped_scenario.description: Validates that preflight checks run before installation
